description.en: A girl saves Houjou family's third daughter from drowning herself. The girl takes her place as Houjou Ran who shall become the Tendou family's bride but her deceit is seen through..?

altTitles.en: I Built the Club of Longevity
I Created the Club of Immortality

description.en: Chen Li works at Mo city, he works there every day with no hope to be seen for the future… until one night. Chen Li obtains a special ability, an ability to buy “Time” and “Lifespan” from people, sell “Time” and “Lifespan” and also let things speed up “Time leap” and slow down “exhaustion time”. So he begins to build a top-class “Lifespan club”!
description.pt-br: Chen Li trabalha na cidade Mo, ele trabalha todo o dia pensando que não há esperanças para o seu futuro... até que uma noite Chen Li consegue uma habilidade especial, a habilidade de comparar e vender tempo de vida, junto a isso ele pode acelerar o próprio tempo e o tempo de outras coisas utilizando o tempo de vida que ele tem

description.en: This is a girls love series. When a delinquent and a role model student start dating, they must conceal their relationship because of their reputations. People would be outraged and not approve of such a couple. Even though Alix and Skip are complete opposites like night and day, they manage to maintain a loving relationship.

altTitles.en: An Angel Flew Down to Me!

altTitles.ja: 私に天使が舞い降りた!

description.en: The four-panel comedy manga's story centers on Miyako Hoshino, a shy college student and otaku. Miyako's younger sister Hinata, who is a fifth grader, has a classmate and friend named Hana. When they meet, Miyako falls for Hana at first sight.
description.es-la: La historia de este manga cómico 4-Koma se centra en Miyako Hoshino, una tímida estudiante universitaria y otaku. La hermana pequeña de Miyako, Hinata, que está en quinto grado, tiene una compañera de clase y amiga llamada Hana. Cuando se conocen, Miyako se enamora de Hana a primera vista...

description.en:
Jang Suchan is an extraordinary college student at the top of the social food chain. But underneath the perfect façade, he hides a pair of insect wings that suddenly grew when he used a mysterious bug spray called "Jungle Juice.” Suchan's life crumbles when he bares his wings to the world to save someone's life. When all hope seems lost, Suchan stumbles upon a hidden world of insect humans where everyone is accepted for what they are.

But the law of the jungle governs this secret society and all must fend for themselves in order to survive.
description.fr:
Le mystérieux insecticide "Jungle Juice" a fait de lui un humain insecte.  
Jang Su-chan, un étudiant qui cachait ses dents, a un jour ressemblé à cela.  
Vous serez vu par tout le monde, et vous serez dans le monde des insectes.  
Vous vous battrez contre la logique du faible…  
  
Action/ Fantaisie de divers pouvoirs d'insectes  
Le nouveau héros de Super String Universe fait son apparition !
description.pt-br: Jang Suchan é um aluno universitário no topo de sua cadeia social. Mas, debaixo da faixada perfeita, ele esconde um par de asas de inseto que cresceram de repente após usar um inseticida misterioso chamado “Jungle Juice”. A vida de Suchan desmorona quando ele exibe suas asas ao mundo afim salvar a vida de outra pessoa. Quando toda a esperança parece perdida, Suchan se depara com um mundo escondido de insetos humanos onde todos são aceitos por quem são. Mas a lei da selva governa essa sociedade secreta e todos devem lutar para sobreviverem.

description.en: A gorgeous Omega transmigrated into a normal society, and he collapsed on the street after getting intoxicated by the pheromone he released.
description.zh: 貌美omega一朝穿越进正常社会，竟因自己释放的信息素醉倒在街头。

altTitles.ja: あのキャラがABJマークとコラボ!

altTitles.ja-ro: Ano Chara ga ABJ Mark to Colabo!

description.en:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Shuppankoho](https://shuppankoho.jp/damage/tokusetsu-3.html) (Click the blue button)
- Video version - [YouTube](https://youtu.be/jCYUazxydpc)
description.ja:
海賊版でマンガが危ない!

ABJマークの付いているサービスで読もう!

- ABJマークって「なんの略」?
>「Authorized Books of Japan＝公認された日本の本」、つまり「正規の出版物」という意味です。

- どうして今、ABJマークなの?
> 残念なことにネット上には、いわゆる「海賊版」（クリエイターから許諾を得ずに、勝手にアップしている違法な電子出版物）があふれています。しかも、正規のサービスと見分けがつかない海賊版サイトも出現しています。一目で正規版サービスであることがわかるマーク、それがABJマークです。電子書店をはじめとする各サービスの目につくところ、おもにトップページに掲示されています。

- ABJマークって「なに」?
> 電子書店等を利用して電子出版物を楽しんでいる読者に対し、そのサービスが、クリエイターからきちんと許諾を受けて配信している正規のサービスであることを示すマークです（でも、正規のサービス全部についているわけではありません。これから、どんどん増えていきます）。

- ABJマークは「安心のマーク」
> このマークがあるサービスで読めば、安心です。海賊版サイトと知らずにアクセスすると、ウィルスやフィッシング詐欺、強制マイニングなどの危険にさらされる可能性があります。また、正規版で読んでいただくことによって、そこからクリエイターに対価が支払われ、新しい次の作品を生み出す力になります。海賊版サイトは、クリエイターに何の利益ももたらしません。運営者が不当に儲けるだけです。

altTitles.en: Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan
The Youngest Son of a Renowned Family of Swordsmen
Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan

altTitles.es-la: El hijo menor del maestro de la espada

description.en:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UspJjUOFrFQ)
description.ko:
진 룬칸델
대륙 최고의 검술명가, 룬칸델의 막내아들
룬칸델 역사상 최악의 둔재

비참하게 쫓겨나 허무한 최후를 맞이한 그에게
다시 한 번 기회가 주어졌다.

“너는 이 힘을 어떻게 사용하고 싶더냐?”
“저를 위해 사용하고 싶습니다.”

전생의 기억과 압도적인 재능, 그리고 신과의 계약

최강이 될 준비는 끝났다.

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UspJjUOFrFQ)

title.en: The Reborn Young Lord Is an Assassin

altTitles.en: The Regressed Son of a Duke is an Assassin
The Regressed Youngest Son of the Duke Is an Assassin

altTitles.es: El asesino que retornó como el hijo del Duque
El pibe que retorna como el hijo menor

altTitles.th: ลูกชายคนเล็กของดยุกคือมือสังหาร

altTitles.es-la: La venganza del asesino de la espada demoniaca

description.en:
Cyan Vert, illegitimate son of the Duke and the empire's greatest assassin, is betrayed by the righteous brother whose shadow he's always lived in. But just before the fatal blow strikes his throat, Cyan awakes to find he's just a boy again. The young lord has been reborn, and this time, he's not going to live in anyone's shadow!

---
Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.

"If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself."

That is how he was given a second chance at life. Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. He will now pave a path on his own, for only him!

altTitles.ja: 絶滅寸前動物ハッチンパモス

description.en:
The Hacchin-Pamos is a critically-endangered species. Let's find out why.

A daily comic series from Q-Rais.

May 2003. An icy planet from distant space crashes into Venus, changing its qualities completely. These qualities prove to present some habitability for humans, enticing men to eventually colonize it for themselves...

80 years later, Venus is home to many people who call it home. However, an ever-present tension between the two major continents, Aphrodia and Ishtar, points to an ominous fate for Venus.

Hiroki Senoo is a rather rebellious member of a motorsport popular within Aphrodia's capital. One day, members of Aphrodia's military approach Hiroki, and, impressed by his skills, invite him to join. Thus, Hiroki finds himself enveloped in Venus's political landscape...

Note: Chapter count resets with Volume 3 to correspond with the second part.

The strongest hero of humanity, Kim Sung Bin.

He threw everything on the line and fought… but he still couldn’t prevent the destruction of the world.

However, his legend has just begun as he returns 20 years into the past.

“I’ll definitely… kill it this time.”

Now fully equipped with overwhelming power and experience, the hero’s raid isn’t over yet!
description.ko:
인류 최강의 영웅, 김성인
모든 것을 내던지며 분투했지만
결국…… 세상의 멸망은 막지 못했다

하지만 그의 전설은 이제 시작이었으니
성인, 20년 전으로 회귀하다!

“이번에는…… 반드시 잡는다.”

압도적인 재능과 경험으로 무장한 완전체
영웅의 레이드는 아직 끝나지 않았다!
description.ru: Сильнейший герой человечества Ким Сон Бин. Он бросил все на кон и сражался, но… не cмог предотвратить разрушение мира. Однако его легенда только начинается, когда Сон Бин возвращается на 20 лет в прошлое.
description.pt-br:
O herói mais forte da humanidade, Kim Sung Bin.

Ele jogou tudo na linha e lutou... mas ele ainda não conseguiu impedir a destruição do mundo.

No entanto, sua lenda apenas começou quando ele retorna 20 anos no passado.

"Com certeza... vou matá-lo desta vez."

Agora totalmente equipado com poder e experiência esmagadores, o ataque do herói ainda não acabou!

title.en: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai

altTitles.ja: つれないほど青くて あざといくらいに赤い

altTitles.vi: Xanh đến nỗi Lạnh Lùng, Đỏ tới mức Xảo Quyệt

description.en: Is this senior... female? Male? Neutral? Demonic? A transfer student suffering from an incurable disease called curiosity meets a mysterious being (human) who is beautiful, cute, cool, and terrifying. The first of a new generation of horror comic authors presents an abyssal love story, a ghost story to peek into and sensuality to you.
description.ru:
Мой сэмпай... Кто же это? Девушка? Парень? Оно? Демон?.. Главный герой — переведенный ученик старшей школы, страдающий неизлечимым чувством любопытства натыкается на красивое, милое, крутое и опасное создание (человека?). С этого момента и начинаются их необычные отношения.

(Source: mangalib)
description.vi: Liệu senpai này là... Nữ giới? Nam giới? Vô giới? Ác quỷ giới?? Một học sinh chuyển trường mắc một căn bệnh vô phương cứu chữa gọi là sự hiếu kì đã gặp phải một tồn tại bí ẩn dưới hình dạng của một con người vô cùng xinh đẹp và dễ thương nhưng cũng rất lạnh lùng và đáng sợ. Một câu chuyện tình yêu nơi vực thẳm, một câu chuyện ma quái đầy gợi cảm, mang đến cho bạn bởi tác giả đứng đầu về một thế hệ mới của truyện kinh dị...!

description.en:
Following a momentous battle against giants for the fate of the world, Ronan emerges victorious as the last man standing of the Imperial Army. As he laments this hollow victory with his dying commander, Grand Marshal Adeshan, they quickly learn that the war is far from over and an overwhelming force of giants descends from the heavens.

Fearing the worst, yet seeing hope in the courageous Ronan, Adeshan uses her last time slip to send him back to the past, so that he can enroll in the prestigious Phileon Academy and become the strongest swordsman the empire has ever seen!

altTitles.ja-ro: Inu ni Nattara Suki na Hito ni Hirowareta

altTitles.ja: 犬になったら好きな人に拾われた。

altTitles.pt-br: Minha Vida como o Cachorrinho da Inukai-san

altTitles.zh: 无意间变成狗，被喜欢的女生捡回家。

altTitles.zh-hk: 變成狗後被喜歡的人撿回家。

description.en:
A little ecchi comedy where you are being kept by a cool, beautiful girl! When you woke up, you found yourself as the pet dog of a girl named Inukai-san! At school, Inukai-san has no expression on her face, but she's a dog lover who loves her dog to pieces! She loves dogs so much that she's going to turn you into a real dog, body and soul! An erotic comedy that makes you stop being human!  
 
- [Manga Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/inuninattara)
description.pt-br:
Uma pequena comédia ecchi onde você está sendo cuidado por uma garota legal e bonita! 

Quando você acordou, você se viu como o cachorro de estimação de uma garota chamada Inukai-san! Na escola, Inukai-san não tem nenhuma expressão no rosto, mas ela adora cachorros! Ela ama tanto cachorros que vai transformar você em um cão, de corpo e alma! 

Uma comédia erótica que faz você querer deixar de ser humano!

description.ar: لقد مضت ست سنوات منذ بدء اللعبة لتحديد مصير العالم. الملك البطل كانغ يو سونغ، أقوى لاعب لم يهبط من مركز هداف الدوري مرة واحدة، يرحب بالموسم الجديد أيضا. “لقد… انتهيت منذ وقت طويل. إنني أفعل ذلك فقط من أجل المال.” [مستوى التذمر قد أزداد بشكل كبير!] [يعرب شيخ اليقطين عن إرتياحه لتصرفات اللاعب!] ان طريقة النجاة للاعب الموهوب المجنون تتكشف الآن!
description.en:
[By Red-Ice Studios, creators of the series  ‘Solo Leveling and Omniscient Reader’s Viewpoint’]

It’s been six years since the game to decide the fate of the world had started. Hero-King Kang Yoo-Sung, the strongest player who hasn’t dropped from the top ranker’s position once, greets the new season, too.

“I… was finished a long fucking time ago. I’m just doing it for the money.”

[Taunt Level has drastically increased!]

[The Elder of Jesters expresses satisfaction with the actions of the contractor!]
An official slice of life themed 4 panel webmanga of the Guardian Tales series.

title.en: I Shaved. Then I Brought a High School Girl Home.

altTitles.es-la: Me afeité la barba. Y luego recogí a una colegiala.

altTitles.ru: Я побрился. Затем привёл старшеклассницу домой.

altTitles.ja: ひげを剃る。そして女子高生を拾う。

altTitles.en: Higehiro: After Being Rejected, I Shaved and Took in a High School Runaway

altTitles.ja-ro: Hige wo Soru. Soshite Joshi Kousei wo Hirou.
Hige Wo Soru. Soshite Joshikosei Wo Hirou.

altTitles.ar: حلقت فجلبت فتاة مدرسة ثانوية إلى المنزل

altTitles.th: โกนหนวดไปทำงาน แล้วกลับบ้านมาพบเธอ

altTitles.zh: 剃须，然后捡到女高中生

altTitles.zh-ro: Tì xū, ránhòu jiǎn dào nǚ gāozhōng shēng

description.en: Yoshida was swiftly rejected by his crush of 5 years. On his way home after drinking his sorrows away, he saw a high school girl sitting on the street. "I'll let you do it with me, so let me stay". "Don't even joke about something like that". And so, the story of living with the high school girl Sayu began. The slice-of-life romance story between a runaway high school girl and a 26 year old salaryman ensues.
description.es: Yoshida fue rápidamente rechazado por su amor de 5 años. En su camino a casa después de consumir sus penas, vio a una chica de secundaria sentada en la calle. "Te dejaré hacerlo conmigo, así que déjame quedarme". "No bromees con algo así". Y así comenzó la historia sobre la convivencia con la chica de secundaria, Sayu. La romántica historia de la vida entre una colegiala fugitiva y un asalariado de 26 años comienza.
description.fr: Après l’avoir aimée pendant cinq ans, Yoshida est rejeté par sa supérieure. En rentrant chez lui après avoir bu pour oublier sa tristesse, il tombe sur une lycéenne assise par terre. « Je te laisserai le faire avec moi, si tu me laisses rester chez toi. » « Ne dis pas des choses comme ça, même pour plaisanter. » C’est ainsi que commence l’histoire de Sayu la lycéenne fugueuse avec Yoshida, un employé banal de 26 ans.
description.ru: Йошиду поспешно отвергла девушка, в которую он был влюблён 5 лет. Утопив своё горе в алкоголе, по дороге домой он встречает старшеклассницу на улице. "Я разрешу вам сделать это со мной, так что позвольте мне остаться у вас". "Даже шутить не смей о чём-то подобном". Так и началась эта история про жизнь с старшеклассницей Саю. Повседневная романтическая комедия между сбежавшей из дома старшеклассницей и 26-летним служащим.
description.pt-br: Desolado e bêbado, Yoshida, um empregado de 26 anos, deparou-se com uma estudante do ensino médio que havia saído de casa quando voltou do bar. "Ei você. JK O que diabos você está fazendo aqui? Vá para casa agora. "Tio, me deixe ficar em sua casa esta noite. Você podemos fazer "isso" se me deixar ficar." "Se você disse em tom de brincadeira, não é engraçado." "Não estou brincando. Está tudo bem por mim." "Então deixe-me dizer-lhe, não tenho interesse em pirralhas." "Hmm? Então, apenas me deixe ficar".

description.en:
The main character, Siwoo Lee, lost his parents to a murderer ten years ago. Finally, he meets Jack, the killer who killed his parents, and beheads him. “It wasn’t me who killed your parents.”
After learning that the real culprit is a "contractor" belonging to a group of killers using superpowers, Si-woo Lee decides to hunt down the registrants with Jack’s help.

altTitles.ja-ro: Jijyou wo Shiranai Tenkousei ga Guigui Kuru

altTitles.pt: O Aluno Sem Noção Transferido É Assertivo

altTitles.ja: 事情を知らない転校生がグイグイくる。

altTitles.zh-hk: 什麼情況都不知道的轉校生一個勁的湊過來。

altTitles.uk: Цей безглуздий переведений учень такий настирливий.

altTitles.en: The Clueless Transfer Student Is Assertive.

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Primeiro Amigo é um Tapado

description.en: Akane Nishimura is a shy and gloomy elementary school girl with an unfounded dire reputation in her class due to her appearance. Taiyou Takada is a transfer student in her class who came from a small countryside school, and who is fascinated by the aspects of Nishimura that her classmates use to pick on her, finding her "darkness" cool beyond compare. Through the unbridled and fundamental joy Takada finds in being her friend, Nishimura starts realizing that being herself is not as bad as she thinks.
description.pt-br: Nishimura é uma garota retraída, hostilizada por todos os colegas por seu jeito sombrio, que dizem até que ela é a Morte em pessoa. Mas isso só chama ainda mais a atenção de Takada, um novo aluno transferido. Sem saber o motivo do apelido, que por sinal ele acha super-maneiro, Takada começa a se aproximar mais e mais da Nishimura para se tornar amigo dela. Uma história cativante, cheia de nostalgia dos nossos tempos de fundamental, sobre uma amizade que vai aquecer seus corações!

description.en:
"Child, you must survive!"

After the destruction of his House by his uncle, all that was left for a young boy, Boris, was the heirloom sword, Winterer. But little did he know that this treasure would become the cause of another crisis. As people seek Winterer, Boris’ heart grows colder and bleaker, much like the winter.

The adventures of Boris — to survive and to protect the sword of his House — begin now. What awaits him at the end of this journey? And what secrets does the winter sword Winterer hold?
At the market, a man stumbles upon a particularly arrogant slave...
description.pt-br: No mercado, um homem se depara com uma escrava particularmente arrogante...

altTitles.th: ขบวนการกำมะลอ

description.en:
Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10000 meters in the sky to invade Earth!

The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety!

The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest…?

From Haruba Negi, the creator of *5Toubun no Hanayome*, comes the action-packed superhero series of a lifetime!
description.es: ¡Hace trece años, el Ejército Villano del mal apareció de repente en su gigantesco castillo flotante a 10.000 metros en el cielo para invadir la Tierra! El ejército villano tiene capacidades de revivir que los hacen inmortales, lo que los convierte en una seria amenaza para la humanidad. Para protegernos de estos invasores, los Rangers Dragón Divino, los Guardianes del Dragón, empuñan sus poderes milagrosos y sus armas, las Herramientas Divinas, ¡y luchan continuamente por nuestra seguridad! ¡El asalto del Ejército Villano! ¡La vigilancia de los Guardianes del Dragón! ¿Tendrán éxito en su conquista? ¡Descúbrelo en la serie de superhéroes llena de acción de toda la vida!
description.fr:
Il y a 13 ans, un château flottant est apparu à 1000 mètres au-dessus du sol et une armée maléfique est venue dans le but d'envahir l'humanité.
Afin de protéger l'humanité contre ces envahisseurs, des super-héros se battent, mais les choses ne semblent pas être comme elles le paraissent !
description.ru: Тринадцать лет назад армия монстров таинственным образом объявилась на территории людей, паря в воздухе на своем летучем замке! Армия монстров обладает различными способностями, которые могут грозить человеческой безопасности. Дабы защитить мирных жителей от вторжения на землю, доблестные герои - Хранители Дракона в составе из пяти человек выходят на поле правосудия! Используя свой туз в рукаве под названием «артефакт», боевой отряд героев из года в год, каждое воскресенье усмиряет неугомонных монстров. Однако, спустя 999 поражений, один из членов команды монстров решает отомстить героям!.. С этого момента и разворачивается наша история борьбы добра со злом!
description.pt-br: Há treze anos, de repente, o Infame Exército do mal apareceu em seu gigantesco castelo flutuante 10.000 metros no céu para invadir a Terra! O exército vilão tinha capacidades de reviver, o que os tornava imortais, tornando-os uma séria ameaça para a humanidade. Para nos proteger contra esses invasores, os Divine Dragon Rangers, os Dragon Keepers, manejam seus poderes milagrosos e suas armas, Ferramentas Divinas, e lutam continuamente por nossa segurança! O ataque do Exército Vilão! A vigilância dos Dragon Keepers! Eles terão sucesso em sua conquista...?

description.en:
'Cha Ju-young' is imprisoned in a juvenile detention center for rendering his gangster father comatose.
Not long after, the father, who was thought never to wake up, comes to visit...
description.pt-br: Cha Ju-young’ está preso em um centro de detenção juvenil por deixar seu pai gangster em coma. Pouco tempo depois, o pai, que se pensava que nunca acordaria, vem visitá-lo…

altTitles.pt-br: Aulas de luta de primeira classe

description.en:
The bullied loser Kim Jaehyuk receives 'Top 1 Fighting Tutoring'!
Kim Jaehyuk is a high school student who has been living in despair under the torment of bullies. He's good at studying, but he'd rather be good at fighting.
Then, as if by fate, a 'fighting tutor' comes into his life!
description.pt-br: Kim Jaehyuk é um estudante do ensino médio que vive em desespero sob o tormento dos valentões. Ele é bom nos estudos, mas preferiria ser bom na luta. Então, o destino põe um "tutor de luta" em sua vida!

altTitles.ja: 訳アリ心霊マンション

description.en: Kaoru Shinonome, who had been living as a freelancer, invests her inheritance in property and buys a vast old condominium. Her dream life as a wealthy landlord is about to begin—but there are no living tenants, only spirits, and her new property is a rollercoaster ride of psychic phenomena. Kaoru embraces her new specter-filled life as the owner of Ghost Mansion and starts recruiting for new non-living residents!

altTitles.en: How to train your brainrot girlfriend

altTitles.es-la: Tengo una novia con la percepción de la realidad alterada

altTitles.tl: Paano Sanayin ang Iyong Jowang Utakbulok

altTitles.vi: Bạn gái bại não của tôi

description.en: Brainrot Girlfriend

The Demon King was defeated… The world is at peace. But… it was too late… Hero Albus is in a hurry. The story turns and begins again, as if naturally, from the place where it all started. The well-informed hero Albus embarks on a new adventure, where ‘time is of the essence’. Time-saving! Efficient adventure strategy! When recruiting a priest, be forceful! It doesn’t matter if you are mistaken for a new kind of scam. And suddenly, he challenges an S-class dangerous monster. Hero Albus seeks to reclaim the future he desires from the past in this ultra-fast readventure (real-time attack) fantasy!
description.vi:
Ma vương đã bị đánh bại... Thế giới sẽ hòa bình trở lại. Nhưng... Đã quá muộn rồi... Anh hùng Albus thật sự đang rất vội. Câu chuyện tua ngược, như thể một cách tự nhiên, trở lại nơi mọi chuyện khởi đầu.

Người anh hùng đầy hiểu biết Albus với đôi mắt lờ đờ như thiếu ngủ, dấn thân vào một cuộc phiêu lưu mới, nơi “thời gian là thứ quan trọng nhất”.

Được đăng dài kỳ trên Weekly Shounen Sunday, nơi đã đăng tải siêu phẩm “Thám tử lừng danh Conan”, người Anh hùng Albus tìm cách giành lại tương lai mà anh ấy mong muốn từ quá khứ trong thế giới fantasy “speedrun” một cách đúng nghĩa này!
description.es-la: El Rey Demonio es derrotado... El mundo está en paz. Pero fue demasiado tarde... El héroe Albus tiene prisa. La historia da vueltas y comienza de nuevo desde el principio, como si fuera algo natural. ¡Esta es una fantasía de re-aventura de alta velocidad donde "el tiempo es lo más importante" para el experto héroe Albus.

title.en: World Teacher – Other World Style Education & Agent

altTitles.ru: World Teacher: Иной мир образования и шпионажа
World Teacher: Обучение по заветам другого мира
Мировой учитель: Иной мир образования и шпионажа
Мировой учитель: Наставник из иного мира
Мировой учитель: Образование и шпионаж иного мира

altTitles.ja: ワールド・ティーチャー -異世界式教育エージェント-

description.en:
A man who was once called the world’s strongest agent ended up becoming a teacher after his retirement, to train a new generation of agents. After many years of training his disciples, he was killed at the age of 60 by a secret organization’s ruse and was reincarnated in another world with his memories intact. Though he was surprised by the existence of magic and the strange species in that world, he quickly adapted to his condition as a newborn and took advantage of it. He acquired special magic and gained a massive amount of strength thanks to his rigorous discipline, in order to reach his goal: Resume his career as a teacher which he left halfway through in his previous life.  
  
This is the story of a man, who, based on the memories and the experiences of his previous life, became a teacher who travels through the world with his students.  
  
Adaptation of a Light Novel.  
  


---
description.ru:
Некогда сильнейший агент, Сириус, пожертвовав собой ради товарищей, переродился в другом мире.  
  
Не успев закончить подготовку своих преемников в прошлом мире, он, вооружившись оставшимися знаниями и опытом, берётся учить окружающих его людей и круто меняет всю их жизнь. Для одних он станет наставником, а для других — быть может, чем-то большим…  
  


---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In Russian by/на русском [Istari Comics Publishing/Истари комикс](https://readmanga.live/world_teacher__other_world_style_education___agent)

description.en:
For some strange reason, Yuji Itadori, despite his insane athleticism would rather just hang out with the Occult Club. However, her soon finds out that the occult is as real as it gets when his fellow club members are attacked!

Meanwhile, the mysterious Megumi Fushiguro is tracking down a special-grade cursed object, and his search leads him to Itadori...
description.fr:
Yuuji est un jeune étudiant qui excelle dans le sport, notamment dans l'athlétisme, mais qui a un immense poil dans la main. Du coup, au lieu de parfaire ses capacités physiques qui pourraient lui permettre de devenir le meilleur de l'établissement, il s'est inscrit au club de recherches occultes du lycée. Son petit train-train va changer du tout au tout lorsqu'un véritable esprit malfaiteur vient menacer son école…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.ru: Юдзи гений на поле! Вот только школьная активность его мало чем привлекает. Став частью клуба оккультных исследований он решает зажить тихой жизнью, но все меняется, когда в школе объявляются духи.
description.tr: Yuuji bir atletizm dehasıdır ama koşuya hiç ilgisi yoktur. Bilinmezleri Araştırma Kulübünde çok mutludur. Her ne kadar kulüpte eğlencesine bulunsa bile, okulda gerçek bir ruh ortaya çıkınca işler ciddiye biner! Hayat, Sugisawa Şehrindeki 3 Numaralı Lisedeki çocuklar için tuhaflaşmaya başlamak üzere!
description.uk: Ітадорі Юуджі - надзвичайно талановитий старшокласник із Сендаю. Утім, хоч він і вправний спортсмен, його не цікавлять спортивні клуби: він піклується про свого дідуся, що лежить у місцевій лікарні. Все змінюється, коли через жартівливий спіритичний сеанс на Юуджі та його друзів раптово нападають моторошні чудовиська, яких дивакуватий незнайомець, Фушіґуро Меґумі, чомусь називає прокляттями. Аби врятувати себе та друзів, Юуджі змушений ризикнути - і так випадково стати вмістилищем легендарного, наймогутнішого короля проклять. А потім на тобі - вирок: "тебе мають стратити". Ну і що робити? Тяжкий вибір, магічна школа, нові друзі й нові проблеми - так починається його шлях...
description.pt-br: Itadori Yuuji, um estudante do colegial com uma capacidade física única, tem como rotina visitar seu avô que está hospitalizado. Porém, um dia, o selo de um "objeto amaldiçoado" escondido em sua escola é rompido, fazendo surgir criaturas assustadoras. Para salvar seus colegas ele parte em direção ao colégio, quando algo inesperado acontece...!

title.en: Kusobitch na Gal Ane o Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 生意気なギャル姉を解らせる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Kusobitch na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi
Kusobicchi na Gyaru Ane o Wakaraseru Hanashi
Kusobicchi na Gyaru Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi
Namaiki na Gal Ane o Wakaraseru Hanashi
Namaiki na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi
Namaiki na Gyaru Ane o Wakaraseru Hanashi
Namaiki na Gyaru Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of Making My Bitchy Gal Sister Understand
The Story of Making My Cheeky Gal Sister Understand
The Story of Making My Cheeky Gyaru Sister Understand

description.en: Every time she opens her mouth, it's nothing but abusive language, and her problematic behavior never stops. The protagonist has had enough and sets a “plan” into motion…??!
description.ja: 口を開けば暴言ばかりで、問題行動が絶えない姉。 彼女に痺れを切らし、主人公が踏み出した“計画”とは---??!
description.es-la:
Su hermana siempre dice cosas hirientes y cuyos comportamientos problemáticos nunca cesan, el protagonista, cansado de ella, da un paso adelante con un "plan"
¿Cuál será...?

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge. Epic sword battle action!
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!
description.pt-br: O jovem Chihiro passa seus dias treinando com seu famoso pai ferreiro. Um dia ele espera se tornar um grande fabricante de espadas. O pai bobo e o filho sério – eles pensavam que esses dias durariam para sempre. Mas de repente, a tragédia acontece. Um dia escuro, encharcado de sangue. Chihiro e sua lâmina agora vivem apenas para vingança. Ação épica de batalha de espadas!

title.en: Ore wo Dame ni Suru Yuki-chan Sensei

altTitles.ja: 俺をダメにするユキちゃんせんせー

description.en:
A man who has nothing to live for goes looking for Yuki, a girl he met five years ago. Yuki is now living in a nursery school, taking care of the children as their "Sensei". When the man is reunited with Yuki, she treats him as a "dear friend," and suggests that he can stay with her. Yuki offers him motherly love and genuine acceptance, so he stays at the day-care center hoping to "keep Yuki to himself" - but what happens?

A depressed man now has a sweet and fluffy girl all over him in this obsessive doting love comedy!

(Source: Comic Gamma Plus, translated)

altTitles.en: Time Slip of the Fist King

description.en:
In a world where humans enslave other races, the archmage ‘Laefenhart’ is treated as the Demon King by the humans for his sins of helping the other races. 

A group of Heroes came to subdue the Demon King! ‘Laefenhart’ succeeds in causing great damage to the Hero party, but ends up being in danger of being killed by the Fist King, ‘Tesron’…

“Space-Time Return Spell.”

The magic spell cast as a last resort miraculously succeeds and sends ‘Laefenhart’ to the past. However…

I became one of the Heroes, the Fist King, ‘Tesron’, who had the strongest body on the continent?!

The archmage ‘Laefenhart’, with his newly acquired physical strength, changes the world with new powers!

A comedy 4-koma manga revolving around the normal life at school of the minor characters of Fate/stay night and Fate/hollow ataraxia, specifically the character Himuro Kane, classmate of Fate/stay night protagonist Emiya Shirou.  
  
It tells about the normal school life of the supporting characters Himuro Kane, Makidera Kaede and Saegusa Yukika. Other characters are the regular cast of the main games: Mitsuzuri Ayako, Tohsaka Rin, Ryuudou Issei, Matou Shinji, Emiya Shirou, Kuzuki Souichirou, Fujimura Taiga, Matou Sakura, Mitsuzuri Minori; "guest" characters from other series Ciel, Seven, Sajyou Ayaka (formerly the heroine of the never finished prototype novel of Fate/stay night) are also featured, and other classmates Gotou Gai, Fujimoto, Dezaki, Hirumata.  
  
The story is centered around classic school events such as a ball game tournament, field trips and inter high school competitions. As such, there is no reference at all to supernatural things like magecraft and Heroic Spirits.

altTitles.ja: ちゃんと吸えない吸血鬼ちゃん

description.en: The overwhelming preciousness that captivates all those whose blood she sucks! A new kind of pampering and feeding comedy!
description.pt-br: A preciosidade esmagadora que cativa todos aqueles cujo sangue ela suga! Um novo tipo de comédia de mimos e alimentação!

description.en:
Cha Iseul is a girl who, without money, is like a lifeless body. She indulges in a depraved lifestyle.

But one day, her card is confiscated, and she faces the threat of being kicked out of the house. At that moment, a mysterious woman named Sori appears in front of Iseul. "Madam, do you really not remember me?"
description.es-la: Cha Iseul es una chica que nació en cuna de oro. Dedicaba sus días a entregarse a los placeres de la bebida, el sexo y el despilfarro de dinero, hasta que su madre le quitó la tarjeta de crédito y decidió no darle ni un centavo más. En plena crisis conoce a Kang Sori, una chica de cabello despeinado y aspecto pasado de moda que parece ser todo lo contrario a ella...

altTitles.en: No Longer Allowed In Another World
No Longer Human in Another World

description.en:
A second life in another world with cute girls by your side and video gamey powers–sounds like a dream, right? Not so for a certain melancholy author, who would quite literally rather drop dead.

Honestly, all the fantastical adventure is just getting in the way of his poetic dream of finding the perfect place to die. But no matter how much he risks his hide, everything seems to keep turning out okay.

Will our terminally depressed hero find a new lease on life in this cheerfully bleak isekai comedy?

---

Inspired by the famous Osamu Dazai's book Ningen Shikkaku (No Longer Human/Disqualified From Being Human).
description.ru: После неудачного двойного самоубийства, наш главный герой переносится в другой мир. И чтобы не случилось, он обещает, что найдёт свою любовь и в этом мире, и опять покончит с собой.
description.uk: Як і у відомій книзі Осаму Дадзая "Бракована людина" / "Крах людини", головний герой цієї історії намагається вчинити подвійне самогубство зі своєю коханою... але замість цього його збиває вантажівка і він потрапляє в інший світ. Тепер він хоче знайти свою кохану, щоб знову покінчити життя самогубством разом з нею.
description.pt-br: Em 13 de junho de 1948, o autor Osamu Dazai estava prestes a se suicidar com Shizuko Ota mas foi convocado para outro mundo. Agora ele quer encontrar a reencarnação de sua amante, para que possa cometer suicídio com ela.

title.en: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: エクソシストを堕とせない

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิส ไม่มีวันตกหลุมรัก

altTitles.fr: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

description.en: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
description.fr: Un jeune prêtre, entraîné par le Vatican pour devenir l'exorciste le plus puissant du monde, reçoit pour mission divine de protéger une jeune artiste, Imuri Atsuki. Sur les conseils de son mentor, il espère néanmoins trouver l'amour afin de soulager son esprit du lourd fardeau qui lui incombe. Imuri sera-t-elle celle qui lui apportera son salut ?
description.ja: 神に選ばれし少年は、最強のエクソシストとして魔王たちと死闘を繰り広げていた。人類の命運を背負いつつも本当は静かにお菓子作りをしていたい、そんな彼に訪れた一人の少女との出会い…。これは壮絶な聖戦の中で芽吹いた、恋と希望の物語。

description.de: Währendessen der Titel "alltägliches Leben" bedeutet ist der Inhalt alles andere als alltäglich. Es handelt sich um ein komplett bizarres und verücktes "alltags Leben" von einer gruppe High School Schüler. Das Setting ist eine außergewöhnliche Schule, wo du den Rektor sehen kannst wie er mit einen Reh kämpft oder einen Roboter Arm. Wie auch immer, es gibt immernoch normale Geshichten, wie ein Kartenhaus bauen oder einen Test schreiben für den du dich nicht vorbereitet bist. Der Stil ist süß aber mischt auch extreme Ausdrücke und Actionszenen für Überraschende Komedie Einlagen.
description.en:
While the title suggests a story of simple, everyday school life, the contents are more the opposite. The setting is a strange school where you may see the principal wrestle a deer or a robot's arm hide a rollcake. However there are still normal stories, like making a card castle or taking a test you didn't study for. The art style is cute but mixes with extreme expressions and action sequences for surprising comedy bits.

(The original magazine run ends at Chapter 192)
description.ru: Обычная манга про обыную японскую жизнь.
description.pt-br: Enquanto o título sugere uma história simples de vida escolar, todos os dias, o conteúdo é mais o contrário. O cenário é uma escola estranha, onde você poderá ver o principal lutar com um cervo ou o braço de um robô esconder um bolo. No entanto ainda há histórias normais, como fazer um castelo de cartas ou de um teste que você não estudou. O estilo de arte é bonito, mas se mistura com expressões extremas e sequências de ação para os bits de comédia surpreendentes...

description.en:
As the world is in the middle of an industrial revolution, a monster appears that cannot be defeated unless its heart, which is protected by a layer of iron, is pierced. By infecting humans with its bite, the monster can create aggressive and undead creatures known as Kabane. On the island Hinomoto, located in the far east, people have built stations to shelter themselves from these creatures. People access the station, as well as transport wares between them, with the help of a locomotive running on steam, called Hayajiro. Ikoma, a boy who lives in the Aragane station and helps to build Hayajiro, creates his own weapon called Tsuranukizutsu in order to defeat the creatures. One day, as he waits for an opportunity to use his weapon, he meets a girl named Mumei, who is excused from the mandatory Kabane inspection. During the night, Ikoma meets Mumei again as he sees Hayajiro going out of control. The staff on the locomotive has turned into the creatures. The station, now under attack by Kabane, is the opportunity Ikoma has been looking for.  


---
description.ru: "Стимпанк история" расскажет о том, как можно выжить в островной стране Хиномото, спрятавшись за высокими стенами крепостей, являющимися своеобразными станциями, от зомбиподобных существ со стальными сердцами, которых называют кабанэ. Связь между станциями поддерживается посредством курсирующих между ними бронированных локомотивов, под названием "Хаядзиро". Икома, молодой ремесленник, помогающий строить Хаядзиро, создает на станции оружие, названное "пронзателем", позволяющее уничтожать кабанэ. Однажды, ожидая возможности применить оружие, он встречает загадочную, безымянную девушку. Той же ночью Хаядзиро выходит из-под контроля, персонал локомотива обращается в кабанэ и станция подвергается атаке. Икоме предоставляется шанс испытать свое изобретение.

description.en: A chain-smoking catgirl struggling with her cigarette addiction.

altTitles.zh-ro: Sanguozhi Qunxiongzhuan: Huo Feng Liao Yuan

altTitles.zh-hk: 三国志群雄伝火鳳燎原

altTitles.de: The Ravages of Time: Die Geschichte der Drei Reiche

description.en:
Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.  
  
Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!

I don’t want to work. I really don’t want to work. But I have no choice.
Problems with Humans, Elves, Orcs, Trolls, Dragons and such alien immigrants never seem to cease.
800 years of disgusted employment. The struggles of a man who will die if he stops working.

On the day of the Wizarding City Paz's destruction, Amina got stuck inside a lamp while trying to turn back time. And 300 years later, she was awakened by a military commander, Jakal.

“I do not have any wishes for you to grant.”
Well, I just want to hurry and grant a wish so I can go back, who the hell is this guy?
  
“Do you know who I am?”
“There is no one else in this world who knows you better than I do.”
“That’s not possible… I’ll disappear one of these days!”

Amina, who needs to go back into the lamp after granted the wishes suddenly meets Jakal who wants to give up his wishes to be with her. However, there are many dangers and threats that prevent him from doing so. Will Amina achieve her wish in the end?

---
Official Translations:
* [Simplified Chinese](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28238)
* [Traditional Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/aminafromlamp/list?title_no=2059)
* [Indonesian](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Lampu-Ajaib-Amina/3355)
* [German](https://www.webtoons.com/de/romance/aminafromlamp/list?title_no=3262)
* [Thai](https://www.comico.in.th/titles/1870)
description.pl:
Co możesz zrobić z trzema życzeniami?

Amina, jedna z ostatnich magików, utraciła wszystkich, których kochała podczas ataku na pałac. Próbując cofnąć się w czasie, aby ich ocalić, utknęła w lampie.

300 lat później pułkownik Jakal obudził ją.

Ma tylko trzy życzenia nim Amina wróci do lampy.

Czego sobie zażyczy?

description.en: Sporadically posted comic pages on the official twitter of the Bombergirl arcade game.

altTitles.ja: センチメンタル キス

description.en: Natsukawa Yuna lives with her busy junior high school teacher mother and her rebellious junior high school younger sister, Nana. She has her hands full with her family, house chores, and her part-time job, but one day she meets a beautiful younger boy in the midst of trouble. The destined love to unfold everything is now in motion!

title.en: The Youngest Is Preventing the End of the World

altTitles.en: The Youngest Child of the Family Is Preventing the World From Ending

description.en:
"The stupid youngest one, the one who doesn't know how to do anything, but causes trouble with her cute face."

Exasperated, I looked in the mirror once again and exclaimed, "Why am I the 'stupid youngest one' Diana Cartier!"

In the novel *The Ending Can't Be the Destruction of the World*, Diana is an evil woman who repeatedly commits evil deeds and is brainwashed by the villain, contributing greatly to the destruction of the world! If something could go wrong for the villainess, it will. But when something went wrong for me, I recalled my past life instead? As an ordinary college student in my past life, I made up my mind when I realized that I had been reincarnated as Diana Cartier, the villainess in the novel.

"The world is going to end. But I'm not going to let it happen."

Yes, I will prevent the end of the world with my own hands! And save my brothers from the conspiracy at the same time! Wait a minute. What's that pitch black thing sprawled out on the floor over there? Wait. That face, where have I seen it before? 

'Is that Linus del Stein?!'

Why are you lying there, Mr. Protagonist of the novel who will destroy this world?

Diana and her brothers are trying their best to stop the end of the world! And cute animals and other stuff? Our sweet youngest is preventing the end of the world, get out of the way!
description.fr:
«La plus jeune et sotte, celle qui ne sait rien faire, mais qui cause des ennuis avec son joli minois.»

Exaspérée, je me suis à nouveau regardée dans le miroir et je me suis exclamée, «Pourquoi suis-je la 'plus jeune stupide' Diana Cartier!»

Dans le roman *Le fin ne peut pas la destruction du monde*, Diana est une femme maléfique qui commet des actes néfastes à répétition et subit un lavage de cerveau de la part du méchant, ce qui contribue grandement à la destruction du monde! Si quelque chose peut mal tourner pour la méchante, cela se produira. Mais quand quelque chose tourne mal pour moi, je me souviens plutôt de ma vie passée? J'étais une étudiante ordinaire dans ma vie passée, et j'ai pris ma décision lorsque j'ai réalisé que j'avais été réincarnée en Diana Cartier, la méchante du roman.

«Le monde va s'écrouler. Mais je ne vais pas laisser faire.»

Oui, je vais empêcher la fin du monde de mes propres mains! Et sauver mes frères de la conspiration en même temps! Attendez un peu. Qu'est-ce que c'est que cette chose noire sur le sol là-bas? Attendez. Ce visage, où l'ai-je déjà vu?

‹Est-ce Linus del Stein?!›

Pourquoi êtes-vous allongé là, Monsieur le Protagoniste du roman qui va détruire ce monde?

Diana et ses frères font de leur mieux pour empêcher la fin du monde! Et des animaux mignons et d'autres choses? Notre adorable petit dernier est en train d'empêcher la fin du monde, pousse-toi de là!
